column1: git merge [remote]/[branch]: Merges changes from a remote branch into the current branch.
git push [remote] [branch]: Pushes committed changes to a remote branch.
git pull [remote] [branch]: Fetches and merges changes from a remote branch.
git cherry-pick [commit hash]: Applies the changes made in a specified commit to the current branch.
git rebase [branch]: Reapplies commits on top of another branch.
git clone --depth 1 [url]: Clones a remote repository with only the most recent commit.
git blame [filename]: Shows who made changes to a specified file.
git bisect: Helps identify which commit introduced a bug.
git submodule: Manages submodules in a repository.
git show-branch: Shows the branch structure of a repository.
git reflog: Lists all actions taken in a repository.
git archive: Creates a .tar or .zip archive of the repository.
git log --graph: Displays a graph of the commit history.
git grep: Searches for text in files in the repository.
git reset --soft [commit hash]: Resets the repository

column2: Initializes a new Git repository in the current directory.
Copies a remote Git repository to your local machine.
Displays the current status of the repository.
Adds a file to the staging area.
Commits changes with a message describing the changes.
Pushes committed changes to a remote repository.
Fetches and merges changes from a remote repository.
Lists all local branches.
Creates a new branch with the specified name.
Deletes a branch.
Switches to the specified branch.
Merges changes from the specified branch into the current branch.
Shows the differences between the working directory and the staging area.
Displays a log of all commits.

column1: git reset [filename]: Removes a file from the staging area.

column2: Resets the repository to the last commit.
Reverts changes made in a specified commit.
Lists all tags.
Creates a new tag.
Deletes a tag.
Shows the changes made in a specified commit.
Stashes changes in the working directory for later use.
Applies the most recent stash.
Lists all stashes.
Deletes the most recent stash.
Lists all remote repositories.
Adds a new remote repository.
Removes a remote repository.
Fetches changes from a remote repository.
Merges changes from a remote branch into the current branch.
